page.title: 13Kellybeare and Harts Farms
page.content: Kellybeare is a period farmhouse and buildings with 20th century additions. Occupants farmer and wife. Family here 41 years. They have a daughter and 2 grandchildren in Plympton. Mixed farming, went out of milk 1985. EEC regulations on milk strongly effected life. Wife helps on farm, takes visitors, including Australians this year. Wife group secretary WI, relief church organist, treasurer village hall. Likes isolation. Plenty to occupy. Harts is a period farmhouse good stone buildings. Family occupation since 1935. Farmer wife and son. Well maintained grassland supporting beef and sheep. Farmer travels area buying cattle. Shops Lifton, Launceston. Contented, self reliant, life style. Owns 2 meonhouse cottages, one unoccupied, other rented by couple, husband unemployed.
